entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming sunny this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6.
